scripts.build: rimraf ./lib && tsc && ncp ./src/protobuf/ ./lib/protobuf/ && ncp ./src/gogo/ ./lib/gogo/ && ncp src/api/typedef lib/api/typedef
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.coverage: rimraf ./istanbul && tsc --project tsconfig-istanbul.json && ncp ./src/protobuf/ ./istanbul/protobuf && ncp ./src/gogo/ ./istanbul/gogo/ && istanbul cover -x 'istanbul/**/*_test.js' --report html ./node_modules/.bin/tape 'istanbul/**/*_test.js'
